entry.title: Cat modelling with python
entry.summary:
Description

PyData London 2016

A brief history of use of python within the Bermuda based reinsurance industry.

A tale of matplotlib, reportlab, numpy, ipython, jupyter and more.

Current challenges and opportunities and an oasis on the horizon.

Slides available here: https://github.com/openbermuda/80days/blob/blog/talks/pydata/talk.pdf

GitHub: https://github.com/openbermuda/80days/tree/blog/talks/pydata
